articles.author: Roger Cohen, Andrew E. Kramer
articles.title: Macron Tries to Avert a European War and Reshape European Security - The New York Times
articles.description: The French president’s shuttle diplomacy this week in Moscow and Kyiv will be a delicate exercise, given European reservations and American resolve.
articles.content: None of this appears likely, however, given Mr. Putins unprovoked direct threat to Ukraine, his annexation of Crimea, his invasion of Georgia in the short war of 2008 and his history of tearing up tr… [+1219 chars]

articles.title: U.S. troops arrive in Poland to reinforce Eastern Europe allies - Reuters
articles.description: A plane carrying U.S. troops landed in Poland on Sunday, a Reuters witness said, as Washington reinforces its NATO allies in Eastern Europe amid a Russian military build-up on Ukraine's border.
articles.content: WARSAW, Feb 6 (Reuters) - A plane carrying U.S. troops landed in Poland on Sunday, a Reuters witness said, as Washington reinforces its NATO allies in Eastern Europe amid a Russian military build-up … [+1941 chars]
